title: paramahamsa guruvE
sahitya:
paramahamsa guruvE mahA kALi varam peTru jnAna taruvE rAmakrSNa


anupallavi

  brahma jnAnattai siru piLLaigaLum ariyap-pEshi vivEkavoLi vIsiya dEshikanE


caraNam    ArugaL sErum alai kaDalAm kaDavuL Adittiyan pOl abhEdam enruraittAi
vEru pADillAda vEda vEdAnta shakti vimarisaiyAi viLangum amara dIpamE jaya jaya
